Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.network.rmi

Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.demo.network.rmi.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class RMIServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements MainControllerInterface
RMI server class that implements the MainControllerInterface. This class handles the creation, joining, and management of games via RMI.
See Also:
